隱位.definition: cryptic epitope (immunology, a protein component that becomes effective when activated by antigen)

隱匿.definition: to cover up; to hide; to conceal

隱名埋姓.definition: to conceal one's identity; living incognito

隱君子.definition: recluse; hermit; used for homophone 癮君子|瘾君子, opium addict

隱含.definition: to contain in a concealed form; to keep covered up; implicit

隱姓埋名.definition: to conceal one's identity; living incognito

隱婚.definition: to be married but keep it secret from family, colleagues or the general public

隱忍.definition: to bear patiently; to endure silently; to forbear

隱忍不發.definition: to keep one's emotions inside oneself; to restrain one's emotions

隱忍不言.definition: to keep one's emotions inside oneself; to restrain one's emotions

隱患.definition: a danger concealed within sth; hidden damage; misfortune not visible from the surface

隱情.definition: sth one wishes to keep secret; ulterior motive; a subject best avoided

隱情不報.definition: not to report sth; to keep sth secret

隱惡揚善.definition: (idiom) to highlight sb's good points but omit to mention their faults

隱沒.definition: to vanish gradually; to disappear; to fade out

隱滅.definition: to fade away; to vanish; to disappear

隱然.definition: a feint; a hidden way of doing sth

隱燃.definition: burning with no flame; fire beneath the surface; hidden combustion

隱生宙.definition: Cryptozoic; geological eon before the appearance of abundant fossils; hidden life, as opposed to Phanerozoic

隱病不報.definition: not to tell others of one's illness

隱痛.definition: hidden anguish; secret suffering; (medicine) dull pain

隱瞞.definition: to conceal; to hide (a taboo subject); to cover up the truth

隱瞞不報.definition: to cover up (a matter that should be reported to the authorities)

隱約其辭.definition: equivocal speech; to use vague or ambiguous language

隱花植物.definition: Cryptogamae; cryptogamous plant (botany); plants such as algae 藻類|藻类[zao3 lei4], moss 苔蘚|苔藓[tai2 xian3] and fern 蕨類|蕨类[jue2 lei4] that reproduce by spores 孢子[bao1 zi3] in place of flowers

隱蔽.definition: to conceal; to hide; covert; under cover

隱蔽強迫下載.pinyin: yǐn bì qiáng pò xià zài
隱蔽強迫下載.definition: drive-by download (a form of malware booby-trap); silent drive-by download

隱藏.definition: to hide; to conceal; to mask; to shelter; to harbor (i.e. keep sth hidden); to hide oneself; to lie low; to nestle; hidden; implicit; private; covert; recessed (lighting)

隱血.definition: occult blood (in medicine, fecal blood from internal bleeding)

隱衷.definition: a secret; sth best not told to anyone; confidential information

隱諱.definition: to hold back from saying precisely what is on one's mind

隱諱號.definition: cross symbol (×), used to replace a character one does not wish to display

隱身.definition: to hide oneself; invisible (person or online status)

隱身草.definition: legendary grass conferring invisibility; fig. to conceal oneself or one's plans

隱身草兒.definition: erhua variant of 隱身草|隐身草[yin3 shen1 cao3]

隱退.definition: to retire (from society, esp. from politics); to vanish

隱逸.definition: to live in seclusion; reclusive; hermit; recluse

隱遁.definition: to disappear from view; to live in seclusion

隱避.definition: to hide; to conceal and avoid (contact); to keep sth concealed

隱顯.definition: appearing and disappearing; dimly visible; intermittent; implicit (but not clearly present)

隱顴.definition: a skull with sunken cheek bone; cryptozygous
